[93mproton[0m [93madsorption[0m [93mcompetes[0m with the [93mformation[0m of [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mmolecules[0m [93mvia[0m an [93mEley[0m-[93mRideal[0m [93mprocess[0m. [93mmethods[0m and is [93mfully[0m [93mreversible[0m [93mvia[0m the [93moxidative[0m [93mdesorption[0m of [93mprotons[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m that the [93mproton[0m [93mreduction[0m [93mrate[0m in [93mdefect[0m-[93mfree[0m [93mgraphene[0m [93mcan[0m be [93menhanced[0m by an [93morder[0m of [93mmagnitude[0m by the [93mintroduction[0m of [93mpotentials[0m for the [93mhydrogenation[0m [93mprocess[0m and in a [93mmore[0m [93mstable[0m [93mcompound[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mresults[0m [93mpave[0m the [93mway[0m to - [93mHigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mpoint[0m [93mstates[0m of [93me[0m/[93m2[0m [93mcharge[0m.: [93mTopological[0m [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m of [93mtwo[0m-[93mdimensional[0m ([93m2D[0m) [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93minsulators[0m ([93mHOTIs[0m) not only [93mserve[0m as a [93munique[0m [93msignature[0m of [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopology[0m, but [93malso[0m [93mpossess[0m [93mtremendous[0m [93mpotentials[0m in [93mprobing[0m, [93mconfining[0m, and [93mmanipulating[0m [93mparticles[0m or [93mquasiparticles[0m as [93mpossible[0m [93mcarriers[0m of [93minformation[0m and [93menergy[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mtopological[0m [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m are [93mnecessarily[0m [93mpinned[0m to [93mcertain[0m [93msymmetric[0m [93mpositions[0m at the [93mouter[0m [93mboundary[0m of a [93mHOTI[0m [93msample[0m, [93mimposing[0m [93mstrict[0m [93mlimitations[0m on [93mtheir[0m [93mpractical[0m [93muse[0m in [93mterms[0m of [93mnumber[0m and [93mpositioning[0m. [93mHere[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mpropose[0m a [93mtheoretical[0m [93mconcept[0m of [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mpoint[0m [93mstates[0m ([93mHOTPS[0m) at [93m0D[0m [93minner[0m [93mvacancies[0m in [93m2D[0m [93mHOTIs[0m that [93mcarry[0m a [93mfractional[0m [93mcharge[0m of [93me[0m/[93m2[0m, to [93movercome[0m the [93mlimitations[0m [93massociated[0m with [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m. [93mExploiting[0m this [93mnew[0m [93mconcept[0m for the [93mHOTI[0m [93mphase[0m in a [93mKekulé[0m [93mlattice[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mfurther[0m [93mexperimentally[0m [93mrealize[0m [93mHOTPS[0m in [93mboth[0m [93macoustic[0m and [93mphotonic[0m [93mmetamaterials[0m. In [93mparticular[0m, it'[93ms[0m not [93mclear[0m [93mwhether[0m a [93mdirect[0m [93mrestoration[0m ([93mtooth[0m [93mfilling[0m) [93mcan[0m [93machieve[0m [93mcomparable[0m [93mtooth[0m [93msurvival[0m [93mrates[0m to a [93mdental[0m [93mcrown[0m ([93mindirect[0m [93mrestoration[0m). This [93mstudy[0m [93mcompares[0m the [93msurvival[0m [93mrates[0m with up to [93m10[0m [93myears[0m [93mpost[0m-[93mintervention[0m for [93mlarge[0m [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m ([93mfillings[0m [93minvolving[0m [93mthree[0m or [93mmore[0m [93msurfaces[0m) with those of [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m ([93msingle[0m [93mcrowns[0m), [93musing[0m a [93mlarge[0m [93mdataset[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mAll[0m [93mpatients[0m ([93mN[0m = [93m189[0m,[93m195[0m) who [93mreceived[0m [93meither[0m [93msingle[0m [93mcrowns[0m ([93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m) or [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m ([93minvolving[0m [93mthree[0m or [93mmore[0m [93msurfaces[0m) between [93m2014[0m and [93m2019[0m in the [93mpublic[0m [93mdental[0m [93mclinics[0m of a [93mSwedish[0m [93mregion[0m were [93mfollowed[0m [93mretrospectively[0m for a [93mperiod[0m of [93m5[0m to [93m10[0m [93myears[0m ([93mN[0m: [93m343[0m,[93m809[0m [93mteeth[0m). [93mOutcome[0m [93mmeasures[0m [93mincluded[0m [93mtooth[0m [93mextraction[0m, [93mroot[0m [93mcanal[0m [93mtreatment[0m, and [93mretreatment[0m with [93meither[0m [93mdirect[0m or [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. [93mResults[0m: The [93m10[0m-[93myear[0m [93mcumulative[0m [93msurvival[0m [93mrates[0m were [93m92[0m,[93m77[0m% for [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m and [93m89[0m,[93m09[0m% for [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. [93mDirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m were [93massociated[0m with a [93msignificantly[0m [93mgreater[0m [93mneed[0m for [93mretreatment[0m during the [93m10[0m-[93myear[0m [93mperiod[0m [93mcompared[0m to [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. The [93mincidence[0m [93mrate[0m [93mratio[0m ([93mIRR[0m) for [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m was [93m1[0m.[93m59[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m [93m1[0m.[93m578[0m-[93m1[0m.[93m611[0m) [93mrelative[0m to [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. [93mPrevious[0m [93mroot[0m [93mcanal[0m [93mtreatment[0m or the [93mpresence[0m of a [93mpost[0m and [93mcore[0m [93msignificantly[0m [93mincreased[0m the [93mrisk[0m of [93mextraction[0m, with [93mhazard[0m [93mratios[0m of [93m2[0m.[93m90[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m [93m2[0m.[93m8389[0m-[93m2[0m.[93m9824[0m) and [93m1[0m.[93m40[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m [93m1[0m.[93m3269[0m-[93m1[0m.[93m4928[0m), [93mrespectively[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mTeeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mlarge[0m [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m [93mtended[0m to [93mrequire[0m [93mmore[0m [93mfrequent[0m [93mretreatments[0m and [93mshowed[0m a [93mhigher[0m [93mrisk[0m of [93mextraction[0m over a [93mperiod[0m of up to [93m10[0m [93myears[0m [93mcompared[0m with [93mteeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. This [93mtrend[0m was [93mparticularly[0m [93mevident[0m among [93mnon[0m-[93mvital[0m [93mteeth[0m, [93mespecially[0m those with a [93mpost[0m and [93mcore[0m or [93mprevious[0m [93mroot[0m [93mcanal[0m [93mtreatment[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mdue[0m to the [93mretrospective[0m [92mdesign[0m and [93mpotential[0m [93minclusion[0m [93mbias[0m, these [93mfindings[0m [93mshould[0m be [93minterpreted[0m with [93mcaution[0m. [93mClinical[0m [93msignificance[0m: Within the [93mlimitations[0m of this [93mretrospective[0m, [93mnon[0m-[93mrandomized[0m [93mstudy[0m, [93mteeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mlarge[0m [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m [93mappeared[0m to [93mhave[0m [93mslightly[0m [93mlower[0m [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93msurvival[0m and a [93msomewhat[0m [93mhigher[0m [93mneed[0m for [93mretreatment[0m than [93mteeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mcrowns[0m. - [93mExtended[0m [93mDefects[0m in [93mSemiconductors[0m
- [93mMechanoadaptive[0m [93mpolysaccharide[0m [93mconjugates[0m [93marchitect[0m [93mpro[0m-[93mhealing[0m [93mmicroenvironments[0m [93mvia[0m [93mdynamic[0m [93mstress[0m [93mredistribution[0m in [93mskin[0m [93mdefects[0m.: The [93mtip[0m [93mstress[0m [93mconcentration[0m in [93mlinear[0m [93mwounds[0m, a [93mclinically[0m [93mprevalent[0m [93missue[0m [93myet[0m [93movershadowed[0m by [93mcircular[0m [93mdefect[0m [93mstudies[0m, and [93mchronic[0m [93mbiotemporal[0m [93mdiscordance[0m ([93mstatic[0m [93mbiomaterials[0m [93mversus[0m [93mdynamic[0m [93mtissue[0m [93mremodeling[0m) [93mremain[0m [93mlargely[0m [93munderexplored[0m, [93mseverely[0m [93mimpeding[0m [93mwound[0m [93mhealing[0m. [93mHere[0m, an [93madhesive[0m [93mbioconjugate[0m [92mplatform[0m, [93mHADEX[0m, [93mcomposed[0m of [93mtwo[0m [93mtypes[0m of [93mmicrometer[0m-[93msized[0m [93mpolysaccharide[0m-[93mderived[0m [93mgranules[0m, was [92mconstructed[0m for [93mprecise[0m [93mshaping[0m and [93mmanipulation[0m. [93mCombining[0m [93mfinite[0m [93melement[0m [92mmodeling[0m with a [93mdynamically[0m [93mcross[0m-[93mlinking[0m [93madhesive[0m [93mdriven[0m by [93mfluid[0m [93mconvection[0m, [93mHADEX[0m [93machieved[0m [93mboth[0m [93mconformal[0m [93mtissue[0m [93madhesion[0m and [93mmodulation[0m of the [93mstress[0m [93mdistribution[0m within [93mwet[0m, [93mlinear[0m [93mwounds[0m, [93mthereby[0m [93mrestoring[0m [93mtissue[0m [93mpretension[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, [93mHADEX[0m [93mfacilitated[0m a [93mseamless[0m [93mload[0m [93mtransfer[0m to [93mregenerating[0m [93mtissue[0m through [93msynchronized[0m [93mHADEX[0m [93mdegradation[0m and [93mendogenous[0m [93mextracellular[0m [93mmatrix[0m [93mdeposition[0m.
